§ 1636i. Termination of authority The authority provided by this subchapter terminates on September 30, 2026. (Aug. 14, 1946, ch. 966, title II, § 260, as added Pub. L. 117–103, div. O, title III, § 301(a), Mar. 15, 2022, 136 Stat. 788; Pub. L. 117–328, div. A, title VII, § 776(a), Dec. 29, 2022, 136 Stat. 4509; Pub. L. 118–42, div. B, title VII, § 793(a), Mar. 9, 2024, 138 Stat. 120; Pub. L. 119–4, div. A, title II, § 1203(a), Mar. 15, 2025, 139 Stat. 16; Pub. L. 119–37, div. B, title VII, § 774(a), Nov. 12, 2025, 139 Stat. 557.)
